# Types of mindfulness

- Dispositional Mindfulness

## Dispositional Mindfulness

- Measured via Five Facet
- Dispositional mindfulness is conceptualized as “trait” mindfulness—a stable characteristic inherent as a human capacity.


# Measures

- Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire (FFMQ)

## Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire (FFMQ)

- Measure of *dispositional mindfulness*
- A well validated measure of dispositional mindfulness
- 39 items rated on a 5-point Likert Scale.
